DOC.brief_summary: This is a four week open label trial of ALLOPURINOL to the treatment regime of ten (10) poorly responsive patients with schizophrenia, monitoring their response and side-effects. No change in medication is required.
DOC.brief_title: An Open Trial of Allopurinol in Patients With Poorly Responsive Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Subjects with schizophrenia and poor response (no prospect of discharge because of symptoms) Over 65 Renal or liver disease Diabetes Hypertension Taking thiazides or ACE inhibitors
